techmeme.title: Sam Altman announces another delay for OpenAI's open-weight model, for further safety testing; the model was slated to be released next week (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Sources: Google is paying $2.4B for a nonexclusive license to certain Windsurf tech and hire some of its employees, but won't be taking a stake in the company (Bloomberg)
T-Mobile has received FCC and DOJ approval for its $4.4B acquisition of US Cellular, after agreeing to phase out DEI programs to comply with FCC policy (Kelcee Griffis/Bloomberg)
Meta has completed a deal to acquire AI voice technology startup PlayAI, and the "entire PlayAI team" is set to join Meta next week, per an internal memo (Kurt Wagner/Bloomberg)
Windsurf's CEO goes to Google; OpenAI's acquisition falls apart (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
